name: Heroes of Xanfurth
description: Heroes of Xanfurth follows the main protagonist Rayn on his 18th birthday as he attempts to discover the cause of unnatural events revolving around his camp of mercenaries known as The Hunt. Choose how you will fight, the types of allies you recruit, and watch the world evolve around you based on your decisions to help, harm, or ignore the plights of various people. Be wary of your choices as some have dire consequences and can lead to Permanent detrimental debuffs for party members.
